pipelines.AbstractPipelineÔÉÅ

class pipelines.AbstractPipeline(storage_path: Path, reader: ProcessedSetReader | SplitSetReader, model, generator_options: dict = {}, model_options: dict = {}, scaler_options: dict = {}, compile_options: dict = {}, split_options: dict = {}, scaler: AbstractScaler | None = None, scaler_type: str = 'minmax')[source]ÔÉÅ

Abstract base class for pipelines used in data processing and model training.

Parameters:

  • storage_path (Path) ‚Äì Path to the directory where results and intermediate files will be stored.

  • reader (ProcessedSetReader or SplitSetReader) ‚Äì Reader object to read the processed data.

  • model (object) ‚Äì The model to be trained.

  • generator_options (dict, optional) ‚Äì Options for the data generator.

  • model_options (dict, optional) ‚Äì Options for the model.

  • scaler_options (dict, optional) ‚Äì Options for the scaler.

  • compile_options (dict, optional) ‚Äì Options for model compilation.

  • split_options (dict, optional) ‚Äì Options for data splitting.

  • scaler (AbstractScaler, optional) ‚Äì Scaler object to scale the data.

  • scaler_type (str, optional) ‚Äì Type of scaler to use (‚Äòminmax‚Äô, ‚Äòstandard‚Äô, ‚Äòmaxabs‚Äô, ‚Äòrobust‚Äô).

_storage_pathÔÉÅ

Path to the directory where results and intermediate files will be stored.

Type:

Path

The model to be trained.

Type:

object

Type:

Type:

Type:

_val_generatorÔÉÅ

Type:

_val_stepsÔÉÅ

Number of steps in the validation set.

Type:

_test_generatorÔÉÅ

Type:

_result_pathÔÉÅ

Type:
